title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled but don't have any effect when moved. This creates confusion for users, especially when opening small images like icons.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they don't have any effect on the displayed image.
EB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars should be disabled and not movable.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only)
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
3. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but don't have any effect on the displayed image.
